comment: - Water quality observed schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.WaterQuality/master/WaterQualityObserved/schema.json
description: Water Quality data model is intended to represent water quality parameters at a certain water mass (river,  lake, sea, etc.) section

contents.name: Al
contents.comment: Property. Aluminium. Concentration of aluminium. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: As
contents.comment: Property. Arsenic. Concentration of arsenic. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: B
contents.comment: Property. Boron. Concentration of boron. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: Ba
contents.comment: Property. Barium. Concentration of barium. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: Cd
contents.comment: Property. Cadmium. Concentration of cadmium. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: Chla
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of chlorophyll A.

contents.name: Cl-
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of chlorides.

contents.name: Cr
contents.comment: Property. Chromium. Concentration of chromium. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: Cr-III
contents.comment: Property. Chromium III. Concentration of chromium at the oxidation state +3. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: Cr-VI
contents.comment: Property. Chromium VI. Concentration of chromium at the oxidation state +6. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: Cu
contents.comment: Property. Copper. Concentration of copper. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: Fe
contents.comment: Property. Iron. Concentration of iron. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: Hg
contents.comment: Property. Mercury. Concentration of mercury. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: N-TOT
contents.comment: Property. Total Nitrogen. Total Nitrogen (TN) is the sum of nitrate-nitrogen (NO3-N), nitrite-nitrogen (NO2-N), ammonia-nitrogen (NH3-N) and organically bonded nitrogen. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: NH3
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of ammonia.

contents.name: NH4
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of ammonium.

contents.name: NO2
contents.comment: Property. Nitrite nitrogen. Concentration of a sample in nitrite nitrogen. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: NO3
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of nitrates.

contents.name: Ni
contents.comment: Property. Nickel. Concentration of Nickel. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: O2
contents.comment: Property. Level of free, non-compound oxygen present.

contents.name: P-PO4
contents.comment: Property. Phosphate-phosphorus. Concentration of phosphorus as phosphate. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: P-TOT
contents.comment: Property. Total Phosphorus. Total phosphorus is a measure of all forms of phosphorus in the water, including dissolved and particulate, organic and inorganic. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: PC
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of pigment phycocyanin which can be measured to estimate cyanobacteria concentrations specifically.

contents.name: PE
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of pigment phycoerythrin which can be measured to estimate cyanobacteria concentrations specifically.

contents.name: PO4
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of phosphates.

contents.name: Pb
contents.comment: Property. Lead. Concentration of lead. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: Se
contents.comment: Property. Selenium. Concentration of selenium. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: Sn
contents.comment: Property. Tin. Concentration of tin. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: THC
contents.comment: Property. Total hydrocarbon. Concentration of total hydrocarbon. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: TKN
contents.comment: Property. Total Kjeldahl Nitrogen. A measure that determines both the organic and the inorganic forms of nitrogen. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: TO
contents.comment: Property. Total oil content. Concentration of oil. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: Zn
contents.comment: Property. Zinc. Concentration of zinc. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: alkalinity
contents.comment: Property. The alkalinity of water is its acid-neutralizing capacity comprised of the total of all titratable bases. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: anionic-surfactants
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of anionic surfactants. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: bod
contents.comment: Property. Biochemical oxygen demand (BOD) is the amount of dissolved oxygen (DO) needed (i.e. demanded) by aerobic biological organisms to break down organic material present in a given water sample at certain temperature over a specific time period. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: cationic-surfactants
contents.comment: Property. Concentrtation of cationic surfactants. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: cod
contents.comment: Property. Chemical oxygen demand (COD) is an indicative measure of the amount of oxygen that can be consumed by reactions in a measured solution. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: conductance
contents.comment: Property. Specific Conductance.

contents.name: conductivity
contents.comment: Property. Electrical Conductivity.

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateObserved
contents.comment: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTCformat. It can be represented by an specific time instant or by an ISO8601 interval.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: enterococci
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of Enterococci. Units:'Total number of bacteria/100mL'

contents.name: escherichiaColi
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of Escherichia coli. Units:'Total number of bacteria/100mL'

contents.name: flow
contents.comment: Property. Units:'cubic meters/hour'. Water Flow observed.

contents.name: fluoride
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of fluoride. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: non-ionic-surfactants
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of non-ionic surfactants. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: orp
contents.comment: Property. Oxidation-Reduction potential.

contents.name: pH
contents.comment: Property. Acidity or basicity of an aqueous solution.

contents.name: salinity
contents.comment: Property. Amount of salts dissolved in water.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: sulphate
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of sulfate. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: sulphite
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of sulfite. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: tds
contents.comment: Property. Total dissolved solids.

contents.name: temperature
contents.comment: Property. Temperature

contents.name: total-surfactants
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of total surfactants. Units:'mg/l'

contents.name: tss
contents.comment: Property. Total suspended solids.

contents.name: turbidity
contents.comment: Property. Amount of light scattered by particles in the water column

contents.name: measurand
contents.comment: Property. An array of strings containing details (see format below) about extra measurands provided by this observation.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
